requirements.summary: Change the Biography section heading from 'About Dr. Charbonnet' to 'A Tidbit About Dr. Shane JC'
acceptanceCriteria: The Biography section displays 'A Tidbit About Dr. Shane JC' instead of 'About Dr. Charbonnet'
The heading appears above the second profile image as described
The text styling and formatting remain consistent with the existing design

file_operations.description: Update the heading text in the Biography component from 'About Dr. Charbonnet' to 'A Tidbit About Dr. Shane JC'. Locate the heading element that appears above the second profile image and modify only the text content while preserving all existing styling, layout, and structure.
